# outputPixelFormat

**Instance Property**

The pixel format type of the output value.

## Declaration

```swift
var outputPixelFormat: OSType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The valid values are [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreVideo/kCVPixelFormatType_TwoComponent32Float] and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreVideo/kCVPixelFormatType_TwoComponent16Half]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreVideo/kCVPixelFormatType_TwoComponent32Float].

## Configuring the Request

- **computationAccuracy**: The level of accuracy to compute the optical flow.
- **VNTrackOpticalFlowRequest.ComputationAccuracy**: Computational accuracy options.
- **keepNetworkOutput**: A Boolean value that indicates the raw pixel buffer continues to emit from the network.
